name: The Eternal Queen's Rampage!
description:
Destroy the city, let nothing stand in your way! And if you die? Well, just upgrade yourself, revive and come back even stronger than before!

The Eternal Queen's Rampage is an action...? game made for Mini Jam #81, with the theme of Kaiju and the limitation of "Death isn't the end."  Play as a destructive creature terrorizing a city, one that grows stronger after every death, but the more destructive you've been, the stronger the enemies they send, even right out the gate.

I'm not perfectly happy with it, but I got everything I wanted in the game, minus some aesthetics, so I'd classify it as a success anyway!

Controls:

  • Movement: [Arrow Keys]/[WASD]
  • Jump:  [Z]/[J]/[SPACE]
  • Attack:  [X]/[K]
  • Special Attack: [C]/[L]
  • Go to Store/Selfdestruct: [E]
